Player History
Drafted in 3rd round, 62nd overall pick, by Houston in 2015...
Traded from Houston to Pittsburgh on 3/1/2015 (Going to HOU: C Qualifying Offer. Going to PIT: SS Vicente Leyba)...
Injured on 8/24/2015 with a Strained Groin Muscle, out for one week...
Injured on 8/24/2017 with a Bruised Foot, out for 3 days...
Injured on 6/2/2018 with a Strained Achilles Tendon, out for 1-2 weeks...
